settings.title: Seemlessly Fitting
settings.description: Engineered for your comfort, designed for your style.

settings.title: GAME IN SIT
settings.description: The Kraken Series brings bold design and uncompromising comfort in one legendary package. Wrapped in our signature high-end leatherette, it delivers a sleek, race-inspired look built to dominate any setup.

settings.title:
LUXURY.

ENDURANCE.

SUSTAINABILITY

ALL IN ONE
settings.description: Luxury meets durability with our sustainable leatherette. Offering the premium feel of NAPA leather and 15x the strength of standard PU, it’s designed to last while protecting the planet.

settings.title:
SOFT YET FIRM

BEST OF BOTH WORLDS
settings.description: Why settle for hard, uncomfortable foam when our ultra-soft memory foam cradles you in cloud-like comfort, while delivering the perfect support designed to keep you supported and focused for years to come.

settings.title: Upright or Not, We've Got You
settings.description: "Designed for every posture—upright, cross-legged, reclined, or leaning—our wider, versatile seatbase ensures comfort that adapts to you."

settings.title: YOUR LUMBAR HAS FOUND ITS MATCH
settings.description: The lumbar support is the heart of a good gaming chair. It intuitively adapts to your movements, providing tailored back support whether you shift left or right.
settings.url_upload: shopify://files/videos/YOUR LUMBAR HAS FOUND ITS MATCH kraken pro.webm

settings.title:
PRECISE ARM SUPPORT RELIEVE

SHOULDER & ARM STRESS
settings.description: Our 4-Way Dynamic Armrests are engineered to support your natural posture, moving seamlessly in every direction to reduce stress on your muscles and joints. These armrests provide the perfect alignment to keep you supported and comfortable.
settings.url_upload: shopify://files/videos/PRECISE ARM SUPPORT RELIEVE SHOULDER & ARM STRESS kraken pro.webm

settings.title:
SNAP. SLIDE. RELAX

ADJUST WITH EASE
settings.description: Designed for effortless comfort and adjustment, our magnetic neck pillow adjusts to the perfect height with ease and stay securely in place. Its ergonomic shape and magnetic precision delivers the optimal support right where you need it most, keeping your neck and shoulder relaxed always.
settings.url_upload: shopify://files/videos/SNAP SLIDE RELAX ADJUST WITH EASE kraken series.webm

settings.title: Versatile Comfort
settings.description: Built for gaming, lounging, napping, and more. Adjust to any position effortlessly with a simple lever pull and push.

settings.title: Maximized Relaxation
settings.description: Find your perfect gaming stance with our multi-tilt mechanism. Adjust tension, lock your angle, and play in ultimate comfort.

settings.title: Adaptive for Every Size
settings.description: SGS Certified Class Hydraulics. Built for strength and durability. Provide smooth height adjustment for personalized comfort.

settings.title:
Find your perfect

chair

settings.heading: 1. How do I track my order?
settings.content: Once your order ships, you'll receive a shipping confirmation email and tracking number, so you can follow your package as it makes its way to you. However, tracking information can take up to 24 hours to update, so don’t worry if it doesn't show up immediately. We recommend tracking your order and ensuring that you’re home on the day of delivery to receive your order.

settings.heading: 2. When Will My Order be Shipped?
settings.content: Inventory orders are typically shipped the next business day and will be delivered within 1-5 business days.  For more information, please check our Shipping and Return Policy.

settings.heading: 3. My order has been shipped. Can I change or cancel my order?
settings.content: Unfortunately, we’re unable to cancel your order once it ships.

settings.heading: 4. Can I exchange my Order？
settings.content: For the most efficient resolution to obtain the item you desire, we recommend returning the original item. Once your return is approved, we encourage you to proceed with a separate purchase for the new item.  For more information, please check our Return & Refund Policy.

settings.heading: 5. How will my order be delivered?
settings.content: We deliver your order straight to your address via FedEx & UPS. You’ll receive an email with a tracking number when your order ships, so you can easily track your order. Please ensure that you’re home on the day of delivery to receive your order.

settings.heading: 6. What do I do if I face an issue with my purchase?
settings.content: In the unlikely event that you come across any damaged, defective or missing parts, please contact us at support@blacklyte.com with a photo of the affected area and your order number. Our support specialists will do their best to assist you.

settings.title: Fast free shipping
settings.text: Typically shipped within 1-2 business days, with delivery taking 3-5 days.

settings.title: 30-day easy returns
settings.text: You can easily return it within 30 days.
